p: D. membranacea Pirre is a Thai traditional medicine and one of the components for herbal formulation used to treat cancer and AIDS. Its rhizome extract enhances lymphocyte proliferation and NK cell activity, whereas the main constituent Dioscorealide B reduces these factors at high concentration ( 113). These findings indicated that the extract was an immunostimulant because of unknown compounds. It also exhibited antiallergy activity by suppressing β-hexosaminidase, TNF-α, and IL-4 in RBL-2H3 cells ( 114).
